dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3849 IH: Extension of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Sewell of Alabama (for herself, Mr. Curbelo of Florida, Ms. Bass, and Mrs. Love) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To extend certain provisions of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act until September 30, 2030, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Extension of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act.

section.header: Extension of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act
section.text: Section 213 of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act (19 U.S.C. 2703) is amended as follows:

paragraph.header: Extension for certain knit apparel articles

subparagraph.text: in subclause (II)(cc), by striking September 30, 2020 and inserting September 30, 2030; and
in subclause (IV)(dd), by striking September 30, 2020 and inserting September 30, 2030.

paragraph.header: Extension of limitation with respect to certain other apparel articles
paragraph.text: In clause (iv)(II) of such subsection, by striking 18 and inserting 28.
In subsection (b)(5)(D)(i), by striking September 30, 2020 and inserting September 30, 2030.
